Package fr.cnes.sitools.security.authentication

Class Summary
AuthenticationApplication Application to configure authentication strategy TODO AuthenticationApplication should be implemented Release 2.
AuthenticatorFactory Class utility for managing Authenticators by domain Sitools V1: One domain ("SITOOLS") and One strategy (BASIC) Usage : Un authenticator est créé avec un verifier pour user+password Objectifs : 1.
AuthentifierResource Resource to handle Authentication strategy configuration requests.
SitoolsChallengeAuthenticator To enrole with public role.
SitoolsMemoryRealm Class for building a Realm with the store of users, groups and roles SitoolsMemoryRealm is a fixed and improved version of Restlet MemoryRealm
SitoolsRealm SitoolsRealm based on a memory Role management
